com.parrot.arsdk.arstream

Class ARStreamReader2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parrot.arsdk.arstream.ARStreamReader2

  • public class ARStreamReader2
extends Object
    Wrapper class for the ARSTREAM_Reader2 C object.

    To create an ARStreamReader2, the application must provide a suitable ARStreamReader2Listener to handle the events.

    • Method Detail

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws Throwable
        Destructor
        This destructor tries to avoid leaks if the object was not disposed
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Object
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks if the current manager is valid.
        A valid manager is a manager which can be used to receive video frames.
        Returns:
        The validity of the manager.

      • runStream

        public void runStream()
        Reader thread function

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the internal threads of the ARStreamReader2.
        Calling this function allow the ARStreamReader2 Runnables to end

      • dispose

        public boolean dispose()
        Deletes the ARStreamReader2.
        This function should only be called after stop()

        Warning: If this function returns false, then the ARStreamReader2 was not disposed !
        Returns:
        true if the Runnables are not running.
        false if the ARStreamReader2 could not be disposed now.
